Class BlobStorageService

java.lang.Object
com.dms.service.BlobStorageService
@Service public class BlobStorageService extends Object
Service class for managing blob storage operations.

    • storeBlob

      public String storeBlob(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
      Stores a blob in the file system.
      Parameters:
      file - the multipart file to store
      Returns:
      the hash value of the stored blob
      Throws:
      FileOperationException - if an error occurs during the storage process

    • getBlob

      public org.springframework.core.io.Resource getBlob(String hash)
      Retrieves a blob from the file system.
      Parameters:
      hash - the hash value of the blob to retrieve
      Returns:
      the resource representing the retrieved blob
      Throws:
      FileOperationException - if the blob retrieval fails

    • deleteBlob

      public void deleteBlob(String hash)
      Deletes a blob from the file system.
      Parameters:
      hash - the hash value of the blob to delete
      Throws:
      FileOperationException - if the blob deletion fails
